welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yildirim, Turkey! Explore the city's rich history, charming architecture, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yenisehir Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
